name: Super Time Surf
description:
Play head-to-head with your favorite rival in this super rad arcade shoot 'em up where you can rewind time on the lasers shot out of the laser cannon head on your two-headed, hoverboard riding flamingo. Bitchin' Sweet.

Winnitron Edition Controls:

Move: Joystick (Mapped to IJKL and Arrow Keys)

Shoot: Button 1 (Mapped to Z and N)

Rewind Bullets: Button 2 (Mapped to X and M)

Home Edition Controls:

Windows/Linux:

Player 1:

Move: WASD

Shoot: Left Control

Rewind Bullets: Left Shift

Player 2:

Move: Arrow Keys

Shoot: Right Control

Rewind Bullets: Right Shift

MAC OS X:

Player 1:

Move: WASD

Shoot: Z

Rewind Bullets: X

Player 2:

Move: Arrow Keys

Shoot: N

Rewind Bullets: M
